verses.verse: In you,<WH3068> Yahweh, I take refuge.<WH2620> Never<WH408> let me be disappointed.<WH954>
Deliver<WH5337> me in your righteousness,<WH6666> and rescue<WH6403> me.<WH5186> Turn your ear<WH241> to me,<WH3467> and save me.
Be to me a rock<WH6697> of refuge<WH4583> to which I may always<WH8548> go.<WH935> Give the command<WH6680> to save<WH3467> me,<WH5553> for you are my rock and my fortress.<WH4686>
Rescue<WH6403> me,<WH430> my God, from the hand<WH3027> of the wicked,<WH7563> from the hand<WH3027> of the unrighteous<WH7563> and cruel man.<WH2556>
For you are my hope,<WH8615> Lord<WH136> Yahweh;<WH3069> my confidence<WH4009> from my youth.<WH5271>
I have relied<WH5564> on you from the womb.<WH990> You are he who took<WH1491> me out of my mother<WH517>'s womb.<WH4578> I will always<WH8548> praise you.<WH8416>
I am a marvel<WH4159> to many,<WH7227> but you are my strong<WH5797> refuge.<WH4268>
My mouth<WH6310> shall be filled<WH4390> with your praise,<WH8416> with your honor<WH8597> all the day.<WH3117>
Don't<WH7993> reject me in my old age.<WH2209> Don't<WH5800> forsake me when<WH6256> my strength<WH3581> fails.<WH3615>
For my enemies<WH341> talk<WH559> about me.<WH8104> Those who watch for my soul<WH5315> conspire<WH3289> together,<WH3162>
saying,<WH559> "God<WH430> has forsaken<WH5800> him.<WH7291> Pursue and take<WH8610> him,<WH5337> for no one will rescue him."
God,<WH430> don't<WH7368> be far from me.<WH430> My God, hurry<WH2363> to help me.<WH5833>
Let my<WH5315> accusers<WH7853> be disappointed<WH954> and consumed.<WH3615> Let them be covered<WH5844> with disgrace<WH2781> and scorn<WH3639> who want<WH1245> to harm me.<WH7451>
But I will always<WH8548> hope,<WH3176> and will add<WH3254> to all<WH3254> of your praise.<WH8416>
My mouth<WH6310> will tell<WH5608> about your righteousness,<WH6666> and of your salvation<WH8668> all day,<WH3117> though I don't<WH3045> know its full measure.<WH5615>
I will come<WH935> with the mighty<WH1369> acts of the Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH136> I will make mention<WH2142> of your righteousness,<WH6666> even of yours alone.
God,<WH430> you have taught<WH3925> me from my youth.<WH5271> Until now,<WH5046> I have declared your wondrous works.<WH6381>

Yes,<WH5704> even when I am old<WH2209> and gray-haired,<WH7872> God,<WH430> don't<WH5800> forsake me,<WH5046> until I have declared your strength<WH2220> to the next generation,<WH1755> your might<WH1369> to everyone who is to come.<WH935>
Your righteousness<WH6666> also,<WH430> God, reaches to the heavens;<WH4791> you have done<WH6213> great things.<WH1419> God,<WH430> who is like you?

You,<WH7200> who have shown us many<WH7227> and bitter<WH7451> troubles,<WH6869> you will let<WH7725> me live.<WH2421> You will bring us up<WH5927> again<WH7725> from the depths<WH8415> of the earth.<WH776>
Increase<WH7235> my honor,<WH1420> and comfort<WH5162> me again.<WH5437>
I will also praise<WH3034> you with the harp<WH3627> for your faithfulness,<WH571> my God.<WH430> I sing<WH2167> praises to you with the lyre,<WH3658> Holy One<WH6918> of Israel.<WH3478>
My lips<WH8193> shall shout for joy!<WH7442> My soul,<WH5315> which you have redeemed,<WH6299> sings praises to you!<WH2167>
My tongue<WH3956> will also talk<WH1897> about your righteousness<WH6666> all day<WH3117> long,<WH954> for they are disappointed, and they are confounded,<WH954> who want<WH1245> to harm me.<WH7451>
